banner1: Lip and Brow Bundle: Save $250 by getting your lips and brows done in the same session
banner2: Saline Tattoo Removal Bundle: Save $50 by committing to 3 sessions
browsAbout1: My signature service, microblading, is a non-surgical solution for brow enhancement that creates beautiful, defined brows. Microblading is a minimally invasive, semi-permanent technique that utilizes fine needles to deposit pigment into the skin. The process allows for a range of finished brow looks from a more natural brow to a defined finished look. This form of make-up treatment offers a multitude of benefits, transforming your brow routine and leaving you feeling empowered every day.
browsAbout2: Ready to transform your brow routine? Explore my service offerings and techniques to see how microblading can give you beautiful, defined brows that save you time and boost your confidence.
footerInfo: Designed by Ana ✨ / All Rights Reserved / Celine's Beauty Studio 2024
homeBio1: Master PMU Artist and Studio Owner, Celine is a skilled permanent makeup artist with 8 years in brow artistry, combining technical precision and a deep understanding of facial anatomy. With extensive experience shaping and styling brows, tinting lips, and using industry tools to help you achieve youthful skin, her goals center around helping you achieve effortless beauty while being committed to the highest standard of hygiene and sterilization.
homeBio2: She loves connecting with her clients, aiming to understand their beauty goals and help achieve a balanced and effortless look.
homeHeroDescription: A certified beauty artist specializing in semi-permanent makeup applications and youthful skin treatments.
homeHeroHeader: Permanent Makeup for Brows and Lips
